Title: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Broome to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Broome to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes for two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Broome to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
